commands.name: /frequency
commands.description: Changes the frequency which DokiBot grabs words to make a poem.

commands.name: /insult force
commands.description: Forces an insult. Forcing an insult will **not** notify users, even if they have notify enabled.

commands.name: /insult list
commands.description: Lists a user's submitted insults. If no parameter is provided, lists your own insults.

commands.name: /insult notifyme
commands.description: Toggles insult notifications for yourself. By default, this is set to OFF.

commands.name: /insult submit
commands.description: Allows you to submit an insult to DokiBot to be approved by a developer.

commands.name: /insult toggle
commands.description:
Toggles whether DokiBot should send a random, unprompted insult once per day. By default, this is set to ON.
**[Requires MANAGE_GUILD permission]**

commands.name: /aniuser
commands.description: Returns info on an anilist user.

commands.name: /character
commands.description: Returns info on an anime/manga character.

commands.name: /moniquote
commands.description: Posts a random Monika quote from the ending of DDLC.

commands.name: /doki
commands.description: Posts an image of a character from DDLC.

commands.name: /husbando
commands.description: Posts an image of a husbando.

commands.name: /neko
commands.description: Posts an image of a nekomimi.

commands.name: /waifu
commands.description: Posts an image of a waifu.
